name: Fate/Extra Record
description:
Remake of 2010s Fate/Extra on the PSP by TYPE-MOON studio BB, originally announced in 2020.
Gameplay will feature major changes, among which the replacement of the Rock-Paper-Scissor mechanic of the original with AP-consuming action commands. Graphics are fully redone from scratch.
Several characters from the original Fate/Extra will be returning, such as Saber, Archer, Caster, Rider, Hakuno Kishinami (both Male and Female protagonists), Tohsaka Rin, Matou Shinji and Rani VIII.
